definition: junior high school/abbr. for 初級中學|初级中学[chu1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

sentences.english: I first read this novella when I was in middle school.
sentences.chinese: 我第一次讀這篇短篇小說是在初中的時候。

sentences.english: I graduated from junior high school star, I lively and cheerful character, witty humor.
sentences.chinese: 偶畢業於紅星初中，偶噠性格活潑開朗，風趣幽母霈。

sentences.english: Babysitting is a rite of passage for many girls in junior high school.
sentences.chinese: 看護兒童是很多在初中的女孩經歷的習俗。

sentences.english: At present , Moral lesson in junior middle school has already generally implemented the open-book examination.
sentences.chinese: 目前，初中思想品德課已普遍實行了開卷考試。

sentences.english: Chapter Five is about the requirements for teachers, teaching materials and tests in culture teaching.
sentences.chinese: 第五章闡述初中英語文化教學對教師的要求。

sentences.english: However, the Small Class Teaching Research aiming at the subject of chemistry of junior middle school is much fewer.
sentences.chinese: 但是，針對初中化學學科的小班化教學研究則較少。

sentences.english: Like the days of junior high school love of quiet, like drinking water flowing.
sentences.chinese: 初中的日子像白開水一樣愛靜地流淌。

sentences.english: Sex education among junior middle school students is a recent introduction to the practice of quality-oriented education in China.
sentences.chinese: 初中生青春期性教育是我國素質教育的新領域。

sentences.english: I went to elementary school and high school in Brooklyn.
sentences.chinese: 我在布魯克林念得初中和高中。

sentences.english: I am 42 years old this year, and graduated from middle school.
sentences.chinese: 今年42歲，初中文化，有個溫馨的四口之家。

sentences.english: One stroke, three-year junior high school life coming to an end.
sentences.chinese: 彈指一揮間，三年初中生活就要結束了。

sentences.english: My husband's first coaching experience was with a junior-high-school basketball team.
sentences.chinese: 我丈夫第一次當教練是教一個初中的籃球隊。

sentences.english: At the end of the year I was asked to teach junior-high math.
sentences.chinese: 那年年底的時候我被安排去教初中數學。

sentences.english: Second grand-daughter is junior middle school 2 years.
It is very difficult to teach English in junior middle school.
sentences.chinese: 唯初中學生與五歲小孩難於管教，各位以爲然否？

definition: senior high school/abbr. for 高級中學|高级中学[gao1 ji2 zhong1 xue2]
to pass brilliantly (used in congratulatory fashion)
third year in junior middle school
2nd year in junior middle school/2nd day of a lunar month/2nd day of lunar New Year
entrance exam for senior middle school
the Great Learning, one of the Four Books 四書|四书[Si4 shu1] in Confucianism
to go to school/to attend school
foundation of a University or College/school opening/the start of a new term
to change schools/to transfer to another college
